name: Nahida
desc:
"Physic of Purity" Nahida

The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , applies <color=#ffffff>Seed of Skandha</color> to target character. If the target character already had <color=#ffffff>Seed of Skandha</color> applied to them, then apply <color=#ffffff>Seed of Skandha</color> to all opposing characters instead.
<color=#ece5d8>Seed of Skandha</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG</color> : Deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . Applies <color=#ffffff>Seed of Skandha</color> to all opposing characters.
<color=#ece5d8>Seed of Skandha</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG</color> : Deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Shrine of Maya</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Shrine of Maya</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction</color> : +1 additional DMG.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc:
"Physic of Purity" Nahida

The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Oh, I know this game — and playing it with you should make it all the more fascinating."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Nahida's deck contains many Companion Support Cards, allowing her to use her immense resource shifting ability to repeatedly trigger Elemental Reactions.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc:
"Physic of Purity" Nahida

The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayato
customize.desc:
"Pillar of Fortitude" Kamisato Ayato

The divinely-blessed cypress sprouts new leaves.

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc:
"Judicator of Secrets" Cyno

The card bears the General Mahamatra's ardent fondness, which reminds one of the scorching sun hanging above the desert

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Nahida

customize.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
customize.desc:
Nahida: The Seed of Stored Knowledge

"Share in my knowledge."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
customize.desc:
Nahida: The Seed of Stored Knowledge

"Share in my knowledge."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Looks like I need to change the way I'm thinking about this game and give it more careful consideration."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Nahida" starts with the Talent Card "The Seed of Stored Knowledge" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Nahida: Friendly

value.name: Nahida
value.desc: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.
